title: Subscriptions
description: The goal of this project is to build a robust and production-ready subscription service while exploring the Rust ecosystem. This project is a learning exercise following the principles and best practices outlined in the `Zero to Production in Rust` book by Luca Palmieri.

title: Ft_Transcendence
description: This project is about creating a Ping-Pong website where users will play Ping-Pong game in real-time with others, with a nice user interface, a chat, and real-time notification and messaging. Built core APIs, JWT-based authentication, real-time sockets, and CI/CD with GitHub Actions.

title: WebServ
description: This project is about writing My own HTTP server (HTTP/1.1) and be able to test it with an actual browser. Designed non-blocking I/O with multiplexing to handle concurrent client connections.
